thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ascent Resources Marcellus, Units Commence Voluntary Chapter 11 Filings

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ascent Resources Marcellus, Units Commence Voluntary Chapter 11 Filings
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Ascent Resources Marcellus Holdings:
* ASCENT RESOURCES MARCELLUS HOLDINGS AND ITS WHOLLY OWNED SUBSIDIARIES COMMENCE VOLUNTARY CHAPTER 11 FILINGS TO EFFECTUATE FINANCIAL RESTRUCTURING
* SAYS ‍ANTICIPATE THAT ARM ENTITIES WILL BE IN CHAPTER 11 FOR ABOUT 45 TO 60 DAYS
* SAYS UPON EMERGENCE FROM BANKRUPTCY, A NEW BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL BE APPOINTED FOR ARM ENTITIES
* SAYS ‍UPON EMERGENCE FROM BANKRUPTCY, EXISTING MANAGEMENT TEAM TO CONTINUE TO MANAGE DAY-TO-DAY OPERATIONS OF ARM ENTITIES​ Source text for Eikon:
